plot: The banal days go by without you realizing it. Vividly colored watercolor integrated with 3D computer animation presents the details of a somewhat unremarkable life to re-discover beauties in common things.
title: Better Life
plot_es: The banal days go by without you realizing it. Vividly colored watercolor integrated with 3D computer animation presents the details of a somewhat unremarkable life to re-discover beauties in common things.
plot_en: The banal days go by without you realizing it. Vividly colored watercolor integrated with 3D computer animation presents the details of a somewhat unremarkable life to re-discover beauties in common things.
